The '''Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch''' ('''ADHGB'''; English ''General German Commercial Code (GGCC)'') was the first comprehensive commercial code in Germany. The term "Allgemein" (''General'') emphasized the whole [[German Confederation]] as the scope of application.('''German''') ''Karsten Schmitt'', in: Münchener Kommentar zum HGB, 3. Auflage, München 2010, Vorbemerkungen zu § 1 Rz. 21. {{Infobox legislation |short_title = ADHGB |legislature = [[Federal Convention (German Confederation)|Federal Convention]] |image = Allgemeines_Deutsches_Handelsgesetzbuch.jpg |imagesize = |imagealt = Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch (ADHGB) for Nassau |caption = |long_title = Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch |citation = [https://de.wikisource.org/wiki/Allgemeines_Deutsches_Handelsgesetzbuch._Inhalt Law text (1869)] |territorial_extent = [[German Confederation]](1861-1866)
[[North German Confederation]](1869-1871)
[[German Empire]] (1871-1900)
[[Austrian Empire|Austria]] (1863-1938)
[[Liechtenstein]] (since 1865) |considered_by = |enacted_by = |date_enacted = |date_passed = 31 May 1861 |enacted_by2 = |date_enacted2 = |date_passed2 = |date_assented = |royal_assent = |date_signed = |signed_by = |date_commenced = |date_effective = |date_of_expiry = |date_repealed = Germany (1 January 1900)
Austria (gradually as from 1938) |administered_by = |bill = |bill_citation = |bill_date = |introduced_by = |1st_reading = |2nd_reading = |3rd_reading = |conf_committee_passed = |committee_report = |bill2 = |bill_citation2 = |bill_date2 = |introduced_by2 = |1st_reading2 = |2nd_reading2 = |3rd_reading2 = |conf_committee_passed2 = |committee_report2 = |date_conf_committee = |white_paper = |amendments = |repeals = |related_legislation = |summary = Commercial Law |keywords = |status = repealed }} == History == === Legal initial situation === Until introduction of ADHGB German commercial law reflected the political splintering of Germany. ==== Preußisches Allgemeines Landrecht ==== The [[General state laws for the Prussian states|Preußisches Allgemeines Landrecht]] (ALR) of 1794 (English ''Prussian General Land Law'') applied to Prussian state territory. Legal provisions for burgher classes („Bürgerstände“) could be found in Eighth Title (''Achter Titel''). This comprised rules for craftsmen (''Handwerker'') (§§ 179 to 400) in addition to these for artists and fabricants (''Künstler und Fabrikanten'') (§§ 401 to 423) and for merchants (§§ 475 to 712). Here §§ 475 bis 496 ALR defined characteristics of a merchant. §§ 497 bis 545 ALR affected factors and [[dispatcher]]s (''Faktoren und Disponenten'') whereby [[procuration]] (''Prokura),'' a special power of attorney, could be found in §§ 498 et seq. ALR. §§ 546 to 553 ALR dealt with merchant assistant and apprentices (''Handlungsdienern und Lehrlingen''), §§ 562 to 613 ALR with trading books (''Handelsbücher'') and §§ 614 to 683 ALR with companies (''Handlungsgesellschaften''). Mecantile interests (''Kaufmännische Zinsen'') werde regulated by §§ 684 to 697 ALR, brokerages (''Provisionen'') by §§ 698 to 701 ALR and merchant recommendations (''Kaufmännische Empfehlungen'') by §§ 702 ti 712 ALR. ==== Code de commerce ==== In areas west of the Rhine and in [[Baden]] (as an annex to Badisches Landrecht (engl. ''Baden Land Law'') of 1810('''German''') Hartmut Oetker, in: Claus-Wilhelm Canaris, Mathias Habersack, Carsten Schäfer (Hrsg.) ''Staub HGB'', Bd. 1, 5. Aufl., 2009, Einleitung Rz. 2.) French Code de commerce of 1808 ruled. ==== Particular law und Common law ==== Apart from that Particular law (''Patrikularrecht'') or subsidiary Common law, here [[Jus commune|ius commune]], (''Gemeines Recht'') were applied.('''German''') Thomas Henne: Handelsgesetzbuch, in: Albrecht Cordes, Heiner Lück, Dieter Werkmüller (Hrsg.), ''Handwörterbuch zur deutschen Rechtsgeschichte'', www.HRGdigital.de/HRG.handelsgesetzbuch.igital (21. November 2015). === Draft of 1849 === Preliminary works for ADHGB can be traced back to 1848/49. Already [[Paulskirche Constitution]] of 28 March 1849 provided in § 64 inter alia establishing a General Commercial Code. On 2 December 1848 a commission had started preparations previously. In March 1849 finally the „Entwurf eines allgemeinen Handelsgesetzbuches für Deutschland“ (Draft of a general commercial code for Germany)('''German''') Theodor Baums: ''Entwurf eines allgemeinen Handelsgesetzbuches für Deutschland (1848/1849)'', Heidelberg 1982, p. 59 ff.; [http://reader.digitale-sammlungen.de/de/fs1/object/display/bsb10290733_00007.html Entwurf eines allgemeinen Handelsgesetzbuches für Deutschland, Frankfurt a.M. 1849.] was presented. After the Prussian King [[Frederick William IV of Prussia|Friedrich Wilhelm IV]] had rejected the imperial crown, that he was offered on 4 April 1849, the constitutional project miscarried. In the same year Commission dissolved. === The ADHGB=== ==== Nuremberg HGB-Commission ==== On a proposal from the [[Kingdom of Bavaria]] the [[Federal Convention (German Confederation)|Federal Convention]] (''Bundesversammlung'' also ''Bundestag'') of the [[German Confederation]] establish a commission, that should elaborate a commercial code. That was 21 February 1856. [[Maximilian II of Bavaria|King Maximilian II Joseph of Bavaria]] is said to have motivated the project in person.('''German''') Christoph Bergfeld: ''Preußen und das Allgemeine Deutsche Handelsgesetzbuch'', in: Ius Commune, Bd. XIV (1987), . 101 (107) Fn. 9. The Prussian deputy for the [[Federal Convention (German Confederation)|Federal Convention]] [[Otto von Bismarck]] thereby voted not against the application against, what contravene with the instruction form the Prussian Prime Minister [[Otto Theodor von Manteuffel]] ('''German''') ibid., p. 101 (108). Also on the suggestion of [[Otto von Bismarck|Bismarck]] not Frankfurt am Main, Federal Assembly's official seat, but the ancient trading town Nuremberg was chosen as conference venue.('''German''') ibid. p. 101 (109). So the working group should go down in history as Nuremberg HGB-Commission (''Nürnberger HGB-Kommission'').('''German''') Cf. only Karsten Schmidt, in: Karsten Schmdit, ''Münchener Kommentar zum HGB'', 3. Auflage, München 2010, Vorbemerkungen zu § 1 Rz. 21. The commission presided by the Bavarian Ministry of Justice Friedrich von Ringelmann was in session as of January 1857. Also numerous merchants belonged to the commission.('''German''') Christoph Bergfeld: ''Preußen und das Allgemeine Deutsche Handelsgesetzbuch'', in: Ius Commune, Bd. XIV (1987), p. 101 (110). German mercantile community and jurists thereby pronounced against Code de commerce as a model for ADHGB, because it was pre-industrial characterized and thus been overtaken by circumstances.('''German''') Ibid., p. 101 (108 et seq.). Instead a Prussian draft war favoured as a working basis. ==== Resolution on ADHGB ==== On 31 May 1861 this "Nuremberg Draft" (''„Nürnberger Entwurf“'')('''German''') Gerhard Köbler: ''Deutsche Rechtsgeschichte – Ein systematischer Grundriss'', 6. Aufl., München 2005. of an Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch (ADHGB) was recommended to be introduced in the individual states by the General Assembly of the German Confederation.('''German''') Hartmut Oetker, in: Claus-Wilhelm Canaris, Mathias Habersack, Carsten Schäfer (Hrsg.) ''Staub HGB'', Bd. 1, 5. Aufl., 2009, Einleitung Rz. 5. As of 1861 ADHGB apllied in German Confederation´s member states as inentical right. Some federal states, like the Free City of [[Hamburg]], even declared ADHGB applicable for legal transactions (''Rechtsgeschäfte'') without merchant participation.('''German''') Christoph Bergfeld: ''Preußen und das Allgemeine Deutsche Handelsgesetzbuch'', in: Ius Commune, Bd. XIV (1987), p. 101 (113). === Development after 1866 === [[German Confederation]] was dissolved in Augsburg on 23 August 1866. ADHGB persisted in the former federal states. ==== Germany ==== [[File:Norddeutsches Bundesgesetzblatt 1869 032 379.jpg|thumbnail|right|Announcement for the North German Confederation (1869)]] [[North German Confederation]] took over ADHGB by federal act (''Bundesgesetz'') on 5 June 1869.('''German''')[https://de.wikisource.org/wiki/Gesetz,_betreffend_die_Einf%C3%BChrung_der_Allgemeinen_Deutschen_Wechsel-Ordnung,_der_N%C3%BCrnberger_Wechsel-Novellen_und_des_Allgemeinen_Deutschen_Handelsgesetzbuches_als_Bundesgesetze Bundesgesetzblatt of North German Confederation 1869 p. 379 - 381.] ADHGB remained in force in [[German Empire]] in accordance with Imperial Act (Reichsgesetz) of 16 April 1871.('''German''') Reichsgesetzblatt 1871, p. 63; The Act of 22 April 1871 ordered that for the [[Kingdom of Bavaria]], Reichsgesetzblatt 1871, p. 63. Supreme court for the interpretation of ADHGB was Reichoberhandelsgericht (ROHG, English ''Imperial Higher Commercial Court'', until 1871 Bundesoberhandelsgericht, English ''Federal Higher Commercial Court"), that later was merged in [[Reichsgericht]] (english ''Imperial Court of Justice''). ADHGB was replaced in German Empire by the [[Handelsgesetzbuch]] (HGB, english ''Commercial Code''), that was legislated on 10 May 1897. The HGB came into force together with the [[Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch|Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch (BGB)]] on 1 January 1900. ==== Austria ==== The ADHGB was introduced as Allgemeines Handelsgesetzbuch (AHGB) (english General Commercial Code) in the [[Austrian Empire|Empire of Austria]] on 1863(österreichisches Reichsgesetzblatt 1/1863). After establishment of the [[Austria|Republic of Austria]] it was applied until the annexation to the German Realm on 13 Märch 1938. Then it was gradually replaced by the Handelsgesetzbuch (HGB). ==== Liechtenstein ==== The Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch (ADHGB) was assumed by the [[Liechtenstein|Principality of Liechtenstein]] by the act of 16 Septembre 1865. To the present day its binding law.('''German''') Kundmachung vom 21. Oktober 1997 des Allgemeinen deutschen Handelsgesetzbuches, [https://www.gesetze.li/lilexprod/ifshowpdf.jsp?lgblid=1997193000&version=2&signed=n&tablesel=0 LGBl. 1997 Nr. 193]. The ADHGB was originally announced by the act of 16 Septembre 1865, Landesgesetzblatt 10/1865 Large parts however were replaced by the Personen- und Gesellschaftsrecht (PGR, english ''Personal and Corporation Law'') on 19 February 1926. The ADHGB has still practical significance for the sectors procurators (''Prokuristen''), authorized representative (''Handlungsbevollmächtigte''), commercial brokers (''Handelsmäkler'') and trading activities (''Handelsgeschäfte'').('''German''') Elisabeth Berger: ''Rezeption im liechtensteinischen Privatrecht unter besonderer Berücksichtigung des ABGB'', 2. Aufl., Wien 2011, p. 65. == Content == With its basic concept('''German''') Thomas Henne: Handelsgesetzbuch, in: Albrecht Cordes, Heiner Lück, Dieter Werkmüller (Hrsg.), ''Handwörterbuch zur deutschen Rechtsgeschichte'', www.HRGdigital.de/HRG.handelsgesetzbuch.igital (21. November 2015). ADHGB pursues preponderantly an objektive system represented by [[Levin Goldschmidt]], that defines merchant (Kaufmann) objektive by means of legally standardized trading activities (Handelsgeschäfte). Orientation on professional conduct according to [[Johann Heinrich Thöl]] was clearly rejected. == Reception == === Germany === In the absence of a "Allgemeines Deutsches Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch" (english ''General German Civil Code'') ADHGB included also general rules for representation (''Stellvertretung'') (Art. 52-56 ADHGB), fulfilling (''Erfüllung'') (Art. 324-336 ADHGB) and [[Bill of sale|purchase agreement]] (''Kaufvertrag'') (Art. 337-359 ADHGB), that should be "a landmark template" (''„richtungweisende Vorlage“'') for future [[Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch|Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch (BGB)]].('''German''') ''Oetker, Hartmut'', in: Canaris, Claus-Wilhelm /Habersack, Mathias /Schäfer, Carsten (Hrsg.) Staub HGB, Bd. 1, 5. Aufl., 2009, Rz. 6. === Japan === The German jurist Hermann Rösler authored a draft of a commercial code for Japan in 1884, that was influenced by the ADHGB.Kon Sik Kim: Codification in East Asia. Commercial Law, in Wen-Yeu Wang: ''Codification in East Asia. Selected Papers from the 2nd IACL Thematic Conference,'' Cham 2014, p. 64; Wilhelm Röhl: ''History Of Law In Japan Since 1868'', Leiden 2005, p. 355 seq. === Turkey === Turkish law also was shaped by the ADHGB.('''German''') Thomas Henne: Handelsgesetzbuch, in: Albrecht Cordes, Heiner Lück, Dieter Werkmüller (Hrsg.), ''Handwörterbuch zur deutschen Rechtsgeschichte'', www.HRGdigital.de/HRG.handelsgesetzbuch.igital (21. November 2015). == Evaluations and comments == For [[Levin Goldschmidt]]Levin Goldschmidt quoted from ('''German''') Karl-Otto Scherner: Handelsrecht, in: Albrecht Cordes, Heiner Lück, Dieter Werkmüller (Hrsg.), ''Handwörterbuch zur deutschen Rechtsgeschichte'', www.HRGdigital.de/HRG.handelsrecht (21. November 2015). ADHGB was "the most thoroughly and best of existing European Commercial Codes" (''„gründlichste und beste unter den vorhandenen Europäischen Handelsgesetzbüchern“''). == Bibliography == General * Johannes W. Flume: ''Law and Commerce – The Evolution of Codified Business Law in Europe'', in: Comparative Legal History (CLH) 2 (2014), p. 46-84. * Mathias Reimann, Joachim Zekoll: ''Introduction to German Law'', The Hague 2005, p. 126 seq. * [https://de.wikisource.org/wiki/Allgemeines_Deutsches_Handelsgesetzbuch._Inhalt ('''German''') Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch. Law text (1869).] * ('''German''') Christoph Bergfeld: ''Preußen und das Allgemeine Deutsche Handelsgesetzbuch'', in: Ius Commune, Bd. XIV (1987), p. 101–114. * ('''German''') Gero Fuchs: ''Die politische Bedeutung des Allgemeinen Deutschen Handelsgesetzbuchs im 19. Jahrhundert'', in: Bonner Rechtsjournal (BRJ) 2013, 13. Special aspects * ('''German''') Diethard Bühler: ''Die Entstehung der allgemeinen Vertragsschluss-Vorschriften im Allgemeinen Deutschen Handelsgesetzbuch (ADHGB) von 1861. ein Beitrag zur Kodifikationsgeschichte des Privatrechts im 19. Jahrhundert'', Frankfurt am Main1999. * ('''German''') Karsten Engler: ''Die Kommanditgesellschaft (KG) und die stille Gesellschaft im Allgemeinen Deutschen Handelsgesetzbuch (ADHGB) von 1861'', Frankfurt am Main 1999. * ('''German''') Ralf Heimann: ''Die Entwicklung der handelsrechtlichen Veröffentlichung vom ALR bis zum ADHGB'', Berlin 2008. * ('''German''') Jörg Hofmeister: ''Die Entwicklung des Gesellschafterwechsels im Recht der Personengesellschaften vom ALR bis zum ADHGB'', Berlin 2002. * ('''German''') Friedrich Benedict Heyn: ''Die Entwicklung des Eisenbahnfrachtrechts von den Anfängen bis zur Einführung des Allgemeinen Deutschen Handelsgesetzbuches (ADHGB)'',Frankfurt am Main 1996. * ('''German''') Albert Schnelle: ''Bremen und die Entstehung des allgemeinen deutschen Handelsgesetzbuches: 1856 - 1864'', Bremen 1992. * ('''German''') Rüdiger Servos: ''Die Personenhandelsgesellschaften und die stille Gesellschaft in den Kodifikationen und Kodifikationsentwürfen vom ALR bis zum ADHGB'', Köln 1984. * ('''German''') Daniel Spindler: ''Zeitwertbilanzierung nach dem ADHGB von 1861 und nach den IAS-IFRS. eine empirische Analyse aus Kapitalgebersicht'', Sternenfeld 2005. == References == {{DEFAULTSORT:Allgemeines Deutsches Handelsgesetzbuch}} [[Category:Civil codes]] [[Category:German business law‎]] [[Category:Legal history of Germany]] [[Category:1861 in law]]

==Profile Of Asare Bediako Adams==
'''Asare Bediako Adams''' (born 18 January 1987) is a [[Ghana]]ian management consultant, project management consultant, a lecturer, an author, marketer and a public speaker. He is the founder and [[Executive Director/ President]] of [[Project Management Research Institute of Ghana]] and has consulted for many international companies.<ref name="web">{{cite web|url=http://www.asareadams.com/about/ |title=ABOUT – Asare Bediako Adams |website=Asareadams.com |date=2014-06-20 |accessdate=2016-10-20}}</ref><ref name="bed">{{cite web|url=http://www.pmrig-group.org/our-team/ |title=Our Team |website=pmrig-group.com |date= |accessdate=2018-02-02}}</ref>
Asare is a management consultant, an author and an ICT for development expert, He has worked for several years developing and applying management and technology solutions for organizations of all sizes. He is currently the Lead Consultant of Alikeinfo Consultancy Limited and the Regional Programs Coordinator for Institute of Project Management Professionals (IPMP) in Ashanti region. He has served as the General Manager (Administrative) at Kumark Company Limited and also the Strategic Partnership officer of 1 Village Limited.<ref name=":0" />
He holds degree in EMBA (Banking and Technology Management), Fellow of Institute of Professional Financial Managers, Chartered Management Consultant, Chartered Professional Administrator, Professional Post Graduate Diploma in Project Management Consultant and a bachelor's degree in Education (Social Studies). He is currently a candidate of Doctoral Fellow in Project Management from the Institute of Project Management Professionals, Ghana. Asare is a Licentiate of the Chartered Institute of Administrators and Management Consultants and a Certified Project Management Consultant from the Institute of Project Management Professionals. Asare Bediako Adams was the head of IT & Information Support Committee, Deputy Head of Corporate & Public Relation Committee and a member of the Steering Committee of Institute of Project Management Professionals and also served as the Ashanti Regional Program Coordinator of Institute of Project Management Professionals.<ref name=":0">{{Cite web|url=https://philpapers.org/profile/477710|title=Profile for Adams Bediako Asare - PhilPapers|access-date=2017-09-27}}</ref>
==Early life and education== Asare was born at [[Kumasi]] in the Ashanti Region of [[Ghana]]. He attended Amankwatia M/A JHS in [[Kumasi]] and Church of Christ Senior High School at Ejisu-Adadientem. He graduated from the [[University of Education]], [[Winneba]], with a bachelor's degree in Education (Social Studies). He furthered his Executive master's degree with Saint Monica University, Cameroon, He also graduated from Institute of Project Management Professionals (IPMP) with a Professional Post Graduate Diploma in Project Management, from Chartered Institute of Administration and Management Consultants-Ghana as a Chartered Professional Administrator and a Chartered Management Consultant and later graduated from CIML Business School in the USA with a Doctor of Business Administration Degree in Project Management. He was also admitted into the Institute of Professional Financial Managers, U.K as a fellow, admitted into Chartered Institute of Leadership and Governance, U.S.A as a Fellow and finally as a Doctoral Fellow with Chartered Institute of Contract, Project and Facility Management in Nigeria. Asare is also a certified Hardware and Networking Engineer from IPMC and a Certified Project Management Consultant from IPMP. He is married to Lisa Appiah, a fashion designer.<ref name = "web" />
==Career== He became a businessman and consultant, launching several enterprises including Bediako Short Messaging Service, Ibed Company Limited, Asare Bediako Trading Enterprise, as well as a consulting firm, Alikeinfo Consultancy Limited. He also taught at Kumasi Technical Institute in Ghana. He earlier on in life worked with 1 Village Ltd as the Strategic Partnership Officer, B. Kaakyire Agrochemicals as a Salesperson and further on move to Kumark Company Limited as the Administrative Manager.
Asare was a Mobile Stockist for Phytoscience Sdn Bhd<ref name="inf">{{cite web|url=https://www.iphytoscience.com/en/index.asp |title=PHYTO SCIENCE SDN BHD - We Are The Trend Maker |website=Iphytoscience.com |date= |accessdate=2016-10-20}}</ref> in Malaysia and the team leader of Supreme Elite Team. He it was the Lead Consultant for Alikeinfo Consultancy Limited,<ref name="wef">{{cite web|url=http://www.alikeinfo.com/our-team/ |title=ALIKEINFO CONSULTANCY LIMITED |website=alikeinfo.com |date= |accessdate=2016-01-20}}</ref> a lecturer at Universal Development College (UDL), a private Polytechnic in Ghana, a lecturer at Institute of Project Management Professionals, and the Executive Director/President of Project Management Research Institute of Ghana.<ref name="wew">{{cite web|url=http://www.ipmp-edu.org/index.php/secretariat/ |title=INSTITUTE OF PROJECT MANAGEMENT PROFESSIONALS |website=ipmp-edu.org |date= |accessdate=2017-01-20}}</ref>
==Books authored== *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2015)''' ''Church Website'': An Effective Evangelistic Tool for the 21st Century, {{ISBN|978-9988-2-0967-4}}, Tema: Hetura Books Publishing <ref name="sit">{{cite web|url=https://philpapers.org/profile/477710 |title=PHIL PAPERS |website=philpapers.org |date= |accessdate=2017-03-20}}</ref> *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2016)''' ''Church Management and Administration'': A 21st Century Guide for Church Leaders, {{ISBN|978-9988-2-4651-8}}, Tema: Hetura Books Publishing <ref name="sit"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2017)''' ''Principles and Practices of Management'', {{ISBN|978-9988-2-7148-0}}, Kumasi: PMRIG Publishers <ref name="sit"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2017)''' ''Financial Management'', {{ISBN|978-9988-2-7149-7}}, Kumasi: PMRIG Publishers <ref name="sit"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2017)''' ''Human Resource Management'', {{ISBN|978-9988-2-7150-3}}, Kumasi: PMRIG Publishers <ref name="sit"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2017)''' ''Marketing Management'', {{ISBN|978-9988-2-7151-0}}, Kumasi: PMRIG Publishers <ref name="sit"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams (2017)''' ''Strategic Management'', {{ISBN|978-9988-2-7152-7}}, Kumasi: PMRIG Publishers <ref name="sit"/>

''“The 21st Century Way of dealing with some issues related to project teams”'', Dama International Journal of Researchers (DIJR), Volume 2,March, Issue 3, pp. 01 – 07, '''2017'''<ref name="sit"/><ref name="tit">{{cite web|url=http://www.damaacademia.com/current.html |title=DAMA INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF RESEARCHERS (DIJR) |website=damaacademia.com |date= |accessdate=2017-03-20}}</ref><ref name="tif">{{cite web|url=https://nimbus.academia.edu/AdamsBediakoAsare |title=ACADEMIA |website=academia.edu |date= |accessdate=2017-03-20}}</ref> *'''Asare Bediako Adams''', Lewis Billy Bonsu, Dr. David Ackah. ''“The Modern Techniques of Commerce with Matters connected to projects”'', Dama International Journal of Researchers (DIJR), Volume 2, March, Issue 3, pp. 25 – 29, '''2017'''<ref name="sit"/><ref name="tit"/><ref name="tif"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams''', Lewis Billy Bonsu, Dr. David Ackah. ''“The Task of a project Manager in Building Individual and Project team Capability in Modern Day Project Work”'', Dama International Journal of Researchers (DIJR), Volume 2, March, Issue 3, pp. 30 – 32, '''2017'''<ref name="sit"/><ref name="tit"/><ref name="tif"/> *'''Asare Bediako Adams''' ''“Project Management for Developing Countries: Back to Basics”'', Dama International Journal of Researchers (DIJR), Volume 2, March, Issue 4, pp. 05 – 09, '''2017'''<ref name="sit"/><ref name="tit"/><ref name="tif"/>

{{Infobox politician | name = Bert Karlsson | image = BertKarlsson2007.jpg | caption = Bert Karlsson in 2007 | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1945|06|21|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Skövde]], [[Sweden]] | occupation = Entrepreneur, Politician, Record company manager | office = [[List of members of the parliament of Sweden, 1991–1994|Member of the Riksdag]]
for [[Östergötland County]] | term_start =1991 | term_end =1994 | known_for = | party = [[New Democracy (Sweden)|New Democracy]] (defunct) | height = }} '''Bert Willis Karlsson''' (born 21 June 1945, in [[Skövde]], [[Västra Götaland County]]) is a [[Sweden|Swedish]] [[record company]] manager, [[entrepreneur]], former [[politician]] ([[Member of Parliament]] 1991-1994) and front figure of the [[New Democracy (Sweden)|New Democracy]] (''Ny Demokrati'') party. As the owner and manager of the record company [[Mariann Grammofon AB]], Karlsson became a familiar face to the Swedish public as the man behind [[Carola Häggkvist]]. In 1984 he started [[Skara Sommarland]], a theme park. In 1991, Karlsson and count [[Ian Wachtmeister]] started the [[populism|populist]] political party ''[[Ny Demokrati|New Democracy]]''. Attracting major media attention, and with a patriotic platform, the party received 6.7 percent of the vote in the [[Swedish parliamentary election, 1991|parliamentary election]] in September. With no previous political experience, Karlsson suddenly found himself elected to the [[Parliament of Sweden|Riksdag]] as a [[Member of Parliament]]. When ''New Democracy'' imploded due to internal struggles and failed in the [[Swedish parliamentary election, 1994|1994 parliamentary election]] Karlsson went back to being a full-time businessman. He has started the popular Swedish [[reality television]] show [[Fame Factory]], (a programme somewhat similar to the British show [[Pop Idol]]), in which he played an important role. Many Mariann artists have entered [[Melodifestivalen]], the Swedish qualifications for the [[Eurovision Song Contest]]. From 1978 to 2005, approximately 120 songs from Karlsson's record company competed, and 14 of these went on to represent Sweden in the Eurovision Song contest. Mariann artists include [[Herreys]] and [[Charlotte Perrelli]], who went on to win the Eurovision Song Contest ([[Eurovision Song Contest 1984|1984]] and [[Eurovision Song Contest 1999|1999]], respectively). In March 2005, Karlsson filled out an application for membership in the [[Liberal People's Party (Sweden)|Liberal People's Party]] during a television interview. When the party immediately responded with criticism of him, calling the move a media stunt, he did not go through with his application. Karlsson was a judge in the first five seasons of the TV show "[[Talang Sverige|Talang]]" on [[TV4 (Sweden)|TV4]], the Swedish version of [[America's Got Talent]], between 2007–2011. ==External links== *{{sv icon}} [http://www.mariann.se/ Mariann Grammofon] - Official page *{{sv icon}} [http://www.dn.se/DNet/jsp/polopoly.jsp?d=1058&a=386689&previousRenderType=1 "Storskalig attack gör Bert Karlsson till vinnare"] - 5 March 2005 [[Dagens Nyheter]] article on Karlsson and [[Melodifestivalen]].{{Dead link|date=March 2016}} *{{sv icon}} [https://web.archive.org/web/20051121165405/http://www.aftonbladet.se/vss/nyheter/story/0,2789,624262,00.html "Här blir Bert folkpartist"] 30 March 2005 [[Aftonbladet]] article on Karlsson's membership application to the [[Liberal People's Party (Sweden)|Liberal People's Party]]. *{{sv icon}} [http://www.folkpartiet.se/templates/PressArchiveListing____17725.aspx?pkID=17482 Liberal People's Party press release] - 30 March 2005 [[press release]] from the Liberal People's Party following Karlsson's statements.{{Dead link|date=March 2016}} *{{sv icon}} [https://web.archive.org/web/20051130161313/http://www.aftonbladet.se/vss/nyheter/story/0,2789,624790,00.html "Bert Karlsson ville bli folkpartist – men nekades"] - 30 March 2005 [[Aftonbladet]] article on Karlsson's reaction to the party press release. *[https://archive.is/20130418112731/http://www.tv4.se/bigfatloser/539897.html / This is the jury, Tv4.se] {{Authority control}} {{Swedish entrepreneurs}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Karlsson, Bert}} [[Category:1945 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Skövde Municipality]] [[Category:New Democracy (Sweden) politicians]] [[Category:Swedish businesspeople]] [[Category:Swedish record producers]] [[Category:Swedish entertainers]] [[Category:Swedish television personalities]] [[Category:Melodifestivalen]] [[Category:Political party founders]]

{{italic title}} '''''Bloomberg Technology''''', formerly called '''''Bloomberg West''''', is an American television show produced by [[Bloomberg Television]]. Andy Lack, [[chief executive officer]] (CEO) of Bloomberg Media Group launched ''Bloomberg West'' in 2011.<ref name=BOSTONIA>{{cite news|title=News Without End|url=http://www.bu.edu/bostonia/summer11/bloomberg/bloomberg.pdf|accessdate=25 July 2011|newspaper=BOSTONIA|date=Summer 2011}}</ref>
The show focused on the topics of technology, innovation and business and was hosted by [[Emily Chang (journalist)|Emily Chang]] and [[Cory Johnson]].<ref name=TechCrunch>{{cite news|last=Arrington|first=Michael|title=Bloomberg Launching Daily Live Tech TV Show Called Bloomberg West On Monday|url=https://techcrunch.com/2011/02/25/bloomberg-launching-daily-live-tech-tv-show-called-bloomberg-west-on-monday/|accessdate=25 July 2011|newspaper=TechCrunch|date=February 25, 2011}}</ref> Before coming to Bloomberg Television, Chang was a [[CNN]] television host in [[Beijing]]. Co-host Cory Johnson, ran a hedge fund and reported on [[Silicon Valley]] for [[CNBC]] before joining Bloomberg Television.<ref name=Reynolds>{{cite news|last=Phillips|first=Robin J|title=Bloomberg launches West Coast show from San Francisco|url=http://businessjournalism.org/2011/02/28/bloomberg-launches-west-coast-show-from-san-francisco/|accessdate=25 July 2011|newspaper=Reynolds Center|date=Feb 28, 2011|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://archive.is/20130414120012/http://businessjournalism.org/2011/02/28/bloomberg-launches-west-coast-show-from-san-francisco/|archivedate=14 April 2013|df=}}</ref>
From its start in 2011, the show was recorded in Bloomberg’s San Francisco studio and aired daily at 6:00pm EST.<ref name=Reynolds/>
''Bloomberg West'' was named ''Bloomberg Technology'' as part of the launch of Bloomberg Technology as a "multi-platform brand" on October 5, 2016.<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.adweek.com/news/television/bloomberg-announces-new-multiplatform-brand-tech-news-173906|title=Bloomberg Announces New Multiplatform Brand for Tech News|last=Main|first=Sami|date=October 5, 2016|work=|newspaper=AdWeek|access-date=2016-10-13|via=}}</ref>
== References == <!--- See [[Wikipedia:Footnotes]] on how to create references using <ref></ref> tags which will then appear here automatically --> {{Reflist}}

{{Infobox person | name = Bobby Samini | image = | image_size = | birth_name=Babak Samini | birth_date =October 12, 1970 | birth_place = | death_date = | death_place = | alma_mater = [[University of Southern California]]
[[Moritz College of Law|The Ohio State University Moritz College of Law]] | occupation = [[Lawyer|Trial Attorney]] | website= [http://www.saminilaw.com Samini Law]
[http://www.huffingtonpost.com/author/bsamini-178 The Huffington Post] | imagesize = }} '''Bobby Samini''' (born October 12, 1970){{Cite web|url=http://members.calbar.ca.gov/fal/Member/Detail/181796|title=State Bar of CA :: Babak Samini|last=California|first=The State Bar of|website=members.calbar.ca.gov|accessdate=2016-05-25}} is an American trial attorney and the President and founding member of Samini Scheinberg, PC.{{Cite web|url=http://saminilaw.com/bobby-samini-2/|title=Bobby Samini|website=Samini Scheinberg PC|accessdate=2016-05-24}} Samini has represented many high-profile clients, including serving as lead counsel to former [[Los Angeles Clippers]] owner [[Donald Sterling]] in highly publicized litigation with the [[National Basketball Association]], [[TMZ]], and [[Donald Sterling|V. Stiviano]].{{Cite web|url=http://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/tmz-dismissed-donald-sterling-lawsuit-article-1.2426409|title=TMZ dismissed from Donald Sterling lawsuit|website=NY Daily News|accessdate=2016-05-24}} Samini also represents several class action plaintiffs against [[Zillow]] in an ongoing lawsuit connected with numerous employment law violations and financial management firm SAIL Venture Partners in a breach of contract action brought by Award-winning singer and actress [[Cher]].{{Cite web|url=http://www.ocregister.com/articles/lawsuit-643877-zillow-kremer.html|title=Ex-employee accuses Zillow of sexual harassment in federal lawsuit|last=COLLINS|first=JEFF|website=The Orange County Register|language=en-US|accessdate=2016-05-24}}{{Cite web|url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/thr-esq/cher-sues-financial-firm-fraud-901014|title=Cher Sues Financial Firm for Fraud After $1.3 Million in Investments|accessdate=2016-07-05}} Samini has been described as a "celebrity attorney"{{Cite web|url=http://www.newspusher.com/EN/post/1454547121-3/exclusive-celebrity-attorney-bobby-samini-retained-by-holli-hartman-vs-taryn-manning.html|title=EXCLUSIVE: Celebrity Attorney Bobby Samini retained by Holli Hartman vs Taryn Manning - Human interest, People (human interest), Celebrity, Crime, law and justice, Judiciary (system of justice), Lawyer - EN - Newspusher|website=www.newspusher.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} and currently represents [[DJ Paul]] of the Oscar winning hip hop group, [[Three 6 Mafia]].{{Cite web|url=http://saminilaw.com/bobby-samini-2/|title=Bobby Samini|website=Samini Scheinberg PC|accessdate=2016-05-25}} ==Background== Samini graduated with a degree in Political Science at the [[University of Southern California]] in 1992 and received his law degree from [[Moritz College of Law|The Ohio State University Moritz College of Law]] in 1995.{{Cite web|url=http://saminilaw.com/bobby-samini-2/|title=Bobby Samini|website=Samini Scheinberg PC|accessdate=2016-05-25}} Samini has been admitted to practice law in the [[State of California]] since 1996.{{Cite web|url=http://members.calbar.ca.gov/fal/Member/Detail/181796|title=State Bar of CA :: Babak Samini|last=California|first=The State Bar of|website=members.calbar.ca.gov|accessdate=2016-05-25}} ==Notable clients== ===Donald Sterling=== [[File:Donald Sterling's Attorney.jpg|thumb|Press Conference During Donald Sterling Trial]] Samini received national media coverage after serving as lead counsel to former owner of the [[Los Angeles Clippers]], [[Donald Sterling]], in litigation with the [[National Basketball Association|NBA]], [[TMZ]], and Sterling's ex-girlfriend V. Stiviano. In April 2014, website [[TMZ]] released an audio recording of a man reported to be Sterling making racial remarks to V. Stiviano, following an [[Instagram]] post featuring Stiviano and basketball Hall of Famer [[Magic Johnson]].{{Cite web|url=https://www.sbnation.com/nba/2014/5/30/5764162/clippers-sale-timeline-donald-sterling-steve-ballmer|title=The complete Donald Sterling saga timeline|last=Price|first=Satchel|date=2014-05-30|website=SBNation.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} In the recording, the man believed to be Sterling, is heard saying: "It bothers me a lot that you want to broadcast that you're associating with black people. Do you have to?" and "You can sleep with [black people]. You can bring them in, you can do whatever you want. The little I ask you is not to promote it on that ... and not to bring them to my games."{{Cite web|url=http://espn.go.com/los-angeles/nba/story/_/id/10843525/nba-investigating-offensive-audio-recording-allegedly-los-angeles-clippers-owner-donald-sterling|title=NBA investigates alleged Sterling racist talk|accessdate=2016-07-05}} {{quote|text=If you're going to come after Sterling, maybe it's time for the NBA to take a close reflection on their own conduct.|author=Bobby Samini|source=[[The Today Show]], June 10, 2014 }} Following a public outcry, [[Commissioner of the NBA|NBA Commissioner]] [[Adam Silver]] announced that Sterling would receive a lifetime ban from the [[National Basketball Association|NBA]], fined $2.5 million by the league, and forced to sell the team.{{Cite web|url=http://time.com/81170/donald-sterling-los-angeles-clippers-nba-adam-silver/|title=NBA Bans Donald Sterling 'For Life' After Racist Rant|website=TIME.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} On August 14, 2014, after an unsuccessful appeal attempt by Sterling, the sale of the [[Los Angeles Clippers]] to former [[Microsoft]] chief executive officer [[Steve Ballmer]] for $2 billion was finalized.{{Cite web|url=http://www.latimes.com/sports/sportsnow/la-sp-sn-sterlings-decide-not-to-divorce-20160311-story.html|title=Former Clippers owner Donald Sterling and wife decide not to divorce|last=Times|first=Los Angeles|website=latimes.com|accessdate=2016-06-11}} In response to the NBA's decision, Samini called the NBA a "band of hypocrites," citing previous discriminatory conduct by the NBA, and suggested the organization "take a close reflection on their own conduct."{{Cite web|url=http://www.today.com/news/donald-sterling-attorney-nba-band-hypocrites-out-sell-clippers-2D79782083|title=Donald Sterling attorney: The NBA is 'a band of hypocrites'|last=Wills|first=Kerry|website=TODAY.com|accessdate=2016-06-11}} In addition, Samini also served as co-counsel to Sterling in his probate and divorce proceedings with wife Shelly Sterling.{{Cite web|url=http://www.law360.com/articles/720257/donald-sterling-can-t-call-foul-in-clippers-sale-to-ballmer/|title=Donald Sterling Can't Call Foul In Clippers Sale To Ballmer - Law360|website=www.law360.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} In March 2016, Samini informed the [[Los Angeles Times]] that "notwithstanding all the difficult events of the last two years, the Sterlings have resolved their differences" and decided not to proceed with their divorce.{{Cite web|url=http://www.latimes.com/sports/sportsnow/la-sp-sn-sterlings-decide-not-to-divorce-20160311-story.html|title=Former Clippers owner Donald Sterling and wife decide not to divorce|last=Times|first=Los Angeles|website=latimes.com|accessdate=2016-06-11}} On November 6, 2015, a Los Angeles judge granted TMZ's request to be dismissed from the case, ruling that TMZ had a right to release the tape because it concerned an issue of public interest.{{Cite web|url=http://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/tmz-dismissed-donald-sterling-lawsuit-article-1.2426409|title=TMZ dismissed from Donald Sterling lawsuit|access-date=2016-07-15}} On March 22, 2016, a federal judge dismissed Sterling's antitrust lawsuit against the NBA.{{Cite web|url=http://www.latimes.com/sports/clippers/la-sp-cn-donald-sterling-nba-case-dismissed-20160323-story.html|title=Donald Sterling's legal battle with the NBA will continue despite setback, his attorney says|last=Times|first=Los Angeles|website=latimes.com|access-date=2016-07-15}} The judge concluded that Sterling could not "show that the NBA parties deprived him of a constitutionally protected interest."{{Cite web|url=http://www.labusinessjournal.com/news/2016/mar/23/judge-dismisses-donald-sterlings-case-against-wife/|title=Judge Dismisses Donald Sterling's Case Against Wife, NBA {{!}} Los Angeles Business Journal|website=www.labusinessjournal.com|access-date=2016-07-15}} In response, Samini released a statement, stating that "it is impossible to believe that, in any other circumstance, a private conversation could be recorded and distributed without an individual's consent or that private medical information could be made public in this manner all without consequence."{{Cite web|url=http://www.labusinessjournal.com/news/2016/mar/23/judge-dismisses-donald-sterlings-case-against-wife/|title=Judge Dismisses Donald Sterling's Case Against Wife, NBA {{!}} Los Angeles Business Journal|website=www.labusinessjournal.com|access-date=2016-07-15}} Despite the setback, Samini announced that Sterling "remains committed to the cause."{{Cite web|url=http://www.latimes.com/sports/clippers/la-sp-cn-donald-sterling-nba-case-dismissed-20160323-story.html|title=Donald Sterling's legal battle with the NBA will continue despite setback, his attorney says|last=Times|first=Los Angeles|website=latimes.com|access-date=2016-07-15}} === Zillow Class Action === {{quote box |quote = Zillow is a "modern day ''Animal House''." |source = —''[[Bloomberg Television]]'', Dec. 4, 2014. |author = —Bobby Samini }} Samini is currently representing several class action plaintiffs against online real estate database [[Zillow]], alleging violations of [[California Labor Code]] and [[California Business and Professions Code]].{{Cite web|url=http://www.law360.com/articles/633646/zillow-escapes-worker-s-5m-ot-class-action-under-landers|title=Zillow Escapes Worker's $5M OT Class Action Under Landers - Law360|website=www.law360.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} On February 26, 2016, the [[United States District Court for the Central District of California|U.S. District Court for the Central District of California]] certified the class to include anyone who worked as an inside sales consultant at Zillow between November 2010 and January 2015.{{Cite web|url=http://www.chicagobusinesslitigationlawyerblog.com/2016/03/3544.html|title=Class Action Certified As to Zillow Consultants for Unpaid Overtime - Chicago Business Litigation Lawyer Blog|date=2016-03-28|accessdate=2016-05-24}} Among numerous allegations, Zillow is accused of failing to pay wages, failing to pay overtime pay, and failing to provide meal and rest breaks. In addition, along with attorney [[Mark Geragos]], Samini represented a former Zillow employee in a sexual harassment action against the company, alleging "sexual torture"{{Cite web|url=http://www.housingwire.com/articles/32237-mark-geragos-more-zillow-employees-victims-of-sexual-harassment|title=Mark Geragos: More Zillow employees victims of sexual harassment|website=www.housingwire.com|accessdate=2016-07-05}} and "the most heinous acts of sexual harassment imaginable."{{Cite web|url=http://www.housingwire.com/articles/37194-zillow-settles-sexual-harassment-lawsuit|title=Zillow settles sexual harassment lawsuit|website=www.housingwire.com|accessdate=2016-06-05}} According to the lawsuit, Zillow's Southern California office represents an "adult frat house where sexual harassment and misconduct are normalized, condoned, and promoted by male managers."{{Cite web|url=http://www.housingwire.com/articles/32237-mark-geragos-more-zillow-employees-victims-of-sexual-harassment|title=Mark Geragos: More Zillow employees victims of sexual harassment|website=www.housingwire.com|accessdate=2016-07-05}} Based on the allegations against the company, Samini has called Zillow a "modern day ''[[Animal House]]''."{{Cite web|url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/videos/2014-12-04/zillow-is-a-modern-day-animal-house-samini|title=Zillow Is a `Modern Day Animal House': Attorney Samini|website=Bloomberg.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} On May 5, 2016, Zillow settled the action for an undisclosed amount.{{Cite web|url=http://www.bizjournals.com/losangeles/news/2016/06/03/zillow-settles-lawsuits-regarding-employees-at.html|title=Zillow settles lawsuits regarding employees at Irvine sales office - L.A. Biz|website=L.A. Biz|accessdate=2016-06-05}} === Cher Lawsuit === Samini represented financial management firm SAIL Venture Partners LLC against a breach of contract action by singer and actress [[Cher]] {{Cite web|url=http://www.entlawdigest.com/2016/06/14/4269.htm|title=Courthouse News Service Entertainment Law|website=www.entlawdigest.com|accessdate=2016-06-19}} in June 2016. According to the complaint, her trust invested $1.3 million for clean technology partnerships and claimed SAIL misrepresented the companies' performance to accrue additional fees.{{Cite web|url=https://www.law360.com/assetmanagement/articles/805279/cher-s-trust-calls-investment-co-s-promises-hogwash-|title=Cher's Trust Calls Investment Co.'s Promises 'Hogwash' - Law360|website=www.law360.com|accessdate=2016-06-19}} Cher claimed that SAIL made "risky and unsound" financial investments through "malicious and fraudulent" business decisions.{{Cite web|url=http://www.completemusicupdate.com/article/cher-sues-financial-firm-over-bad-investments/|title=Cher sues financial firm over bad investments {{!}} Complete Music Update|website=www.completemusicupdate.com|accessdate=2016-07-05}} The allegations include breach of contract, breach of fiduciary duty, and professional negligence.{{Cite web|url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/thr-esq/cher-sues-financial-firm-fraud-901014|title=Cher Sues Financial Firm for Fraud After $1.3 Million in Investments|website=The Hollywood Reporter|accessdate=2016-06-19}} The lawsuit was dismissed January 2018.{{Cite web|url=https://www.lacourt.org/paonlineservices/civilImages/searchByCaseNumberResult.aspx?caseNumber=BC623150|title=Payment Services - Online Services - LA Court|website=www.lacourt.org|access-date=2018-08-02}} === DJ Paul === Samini currently represents rapper [[DJ Paul]] of the [[Academy Award]] winning hip-hop group [[Three 6 Mafia]].{{cite web|url=http://saminilaw.com/bobby-samini-2/|title=Samini Scheinberg PC – Bobby Samini|publisher=saminilaw.com|accessdate=2016-07-13}} === Mitsubishi Class Action === Samini is lead counsel for a [[Mitsubishi]] dealership owner with four locations in [[Southern California]] in a multimillion-dollar litigation against [[Mitsubishi Motors North America]].{{Cite web|url=http://www.nbcnews.com/business/autos/dealer-claims-mitsubishi-channel-stuffing-cost-millions-n132661|title=Dealer Claims Mitsubishi 'Channel Stuffing' Cost Millions - NBC News|website=NBC News|accessdate=2016-06-03}} Among the allegations, the lawsuit alleges that Mitsubishi forced dealerships to stock more cars than could be sold, resulting in millions of dollars in extra finance charges.{{Cite web|url=http://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2014/jun/17/4-california-dealerships-sue-mitsubishi-motors/|title=California dealer sues Mitsubishi over inventory|last=http://www.washingtontimes.com|first=The Washington Times|website=The Washingtion Times|accessdate=2016-06-03}} Samini claims the increased inventory cost his client $10 million and that the "impermissible increases in new car inventory at Cerritos Mitsubishi continue to this day."{{Cite web|url=http://uncovercalifornia.com/content/california-car-dealer-sues-mitsubishi-over-inventory|title=California car dealer sues Mitsubishi over inventory {{!}} Uncover California|website=uncovercalifornia.com|accessdate=2016-06-14}} In addition, Samini also represents two former auto dealers in class actions against Mitsubishi Motors of North America for [[racketeering]], [[fraud]], and [[unfair business practices]]. ==Media appearances== === On-air commentary === Samini has appeared on multiple national news television programs to provide legal commentary, including ''[[Anderson Cooper 360°|Anderson Cooper 360]]''[[Anderson Cooper 360°|°]], [[NBC]]'s [[Today (U.S. TV program)|''The Today Show'']] with [[Matt Lauer]], and [[Fox Business Network|FOX Business Network]]'s ''Cavuto: Coast to Coast'' with [[Neil Cavuto]].{{Cite web|url=http://ac360.blogs.cnn.com/category/donald-sterling/|title=Donald Sterling|website=ac360.blogs.cnn.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}}{{Cite web|url=http://www.today.com/news/donald-sterling-attorney-nba-band-hypocrites-out-sell-clippers-2D79782083|title=Donald Sterling attorney: The NBA is 'a band of hypocrites'|last=Wills|first=Kerry|website=TODAY.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}}{{Cite web|url=http://video.foxbusiness.com/v/3715836563001/donald-sterlings-attorney-my-client-is-actually-a-decent-person/?#sp=show-clips|title=Donald Sterling's attorney: My client is actually a 'decent person'|date=2014-08-05|website=Fox Business|language=en-US|accessdate=2016-05-24}} In addition, Samini has appeared as a guest on ''[[Good Day L.A.]]'', [[CNN]]'s [[New Day (TV series)|''New Day'']] with [[Chris Cuomo]] and [[Bloomberg Television]]'s ''Street Smart'' with [[Trish Regan]].{{Cite web|url=http://www.cnn.com/videos/bestoftv/2014/06/13/sterlings-lawyer-samini-interview-full-newday.cnn|title=Sterling's comments 'don't represent him' - CNN Video|website=CNN|accessdate=2016-05-24}}{{Cite web|url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/videos/2014-12-04/zillow-is-a-modern-day-animal-house-samini|title=Zillow Is a `Modern Day Animal House': Attorney Samini|website=Bloomberg.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}} === Publications === Samini has published articles and contributed legal commentary for multiple news websites including [[The Huffington Post]],{{Cite web|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/author/bsamini-178|title=Bobby Samini {{!}} Huffington Post|website=www.huffingtonpost.com|access-date=2016-10-01}} [[Law360]],{{Cite web|url=http://www.law360.com/articles/839881/secret-tape-recordings-state-law-can-seal-your-fate|title=Secret Tape Recordings: State Law Can Seal Your Fate - Law360|website=www.law360.com|access-date=2016-10-01}} and LawNewz by [[Dan Abrams]].{{Cite web|url=http://lawnewz.com/high-profile/legal-implications-of-samsungs-huge-recall-of-galaxy-note-7-phones/|title=Legal Implications of Samsung's Huge Recall of Galaxy Note 7 Phones|website=lawnewz.com|access-date=2016-10-01}} In addition, Samini has been interviewed by [[ESPN]], the [[Los Angeles Times]], and [[Forbes]].{{Cite web|url=http://espn.go.com/espnradio/play?id=11146292|title=Bobby Samini, Donald Sterling's Lawyer|website=ESPN.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}}{{Cite web|url=http://www.latimes.com/sports/clippers/la-sp-cn-donald-sterling-nba-case-dismissed-20160323-story.html|title=Donald Sterling's legal battle with the NBA will continue despite setback, his attorney says|last=Times|first=Los Angeles|website=latimes.com|accessdate=2016-05-24}}{{Cite web|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/nathanvardi/2014/06/17/how-rochelle-sterling-got-donald-sterlings-medical-records-to-claim-control-of-the-clippers/#15220d1e5713|title=How Rochelle Sterling Got Donald Sterling's Medical Records To Claim Control Of The Clippers|last=Vardi|first=Nathan|website=Forbes|accessdate=2016-05-24}} Samini was named Los Angeles Attorney of the Month by Attorney at Law Magazine in April 2017.{{Cite web|url=http://www.attorneyatlawmagazine.com/bobby-samini/|title=Bobby Samini Named Los Angeles Attorney of the Month {{!}} Attorney At Law Magazine - Attorney At Law Magazine|website=www.attorneyatlawmagazine.com|language=en-US|access-date=2017-05-04}} == See also == * [[Donald Sterling#Racial remarks and lifetime ban|Donald Sterling Controversy]] * [[Donald Sterling#Personal life|Donald Sterling Divorce from Shelly Sterling]] * [[Zillow#Controversy and lawsuits|Zillow Controversy and Lawsuits]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == *
